abstract: Christine Lagarde said that the euro zone was discussing how to support weaker countries but that the final decisions would not come before March.
snippet: Christine Lagarde said that the euro zone was discussing how to support weaker countries but that the final decisions would not come before March.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — If the countries that share the euro are moving toward a tighter fiscal union to support the currency, as some observers indicate is needed, France is reluctant to say so.

headline.main: Tighter Fiscal Union in Europe? Not So Fast, Says French Finance Minister
headline.print_headline: French Minister Reports Talk of Fiscal ‘Consolidation,’Not ‘Union,’ in Europe
